name: Copy of Nexus Support Hub V26
description:
Nexus Support Hub – Presentation

An intelligent help desk featuring our AI assistant 'Nexus'. Get instant support, manage tickets efficiently with role-based dashboards, and use voice commands for a hands-free experience.

Key Features:

24/7 AI-powered chat assistant

Automatic ticket categorization and prioritization

Role-based dashboards (User, Agent, Manager)

Voice command and speech synthesis

Multilingual support (English, French, Arabic)

Payment Plan (via PayPal)

Free Plan: Up to 1 agent, 100 tickets/month

Standard Plan: €10 per agent/month (unlimited tickets, full AI features)

Pro Plan: €20 per agent/month (includes advanced analytics, voice command, multilingual support)

Payments processed securely via PayPal. Monthly or annual billing options available.

User Manual (Quick Start)

Sign Up: Create your company account and configure roles (User, Agent, Manager).

AI Assistant: Activate 'Nexus' in the settings and connect your Gemini API key (for AI responses).

Manage Tickets: Use your dashboard to view, assign, and resolve tickets. Tickets are auto-categorized by Nexus.

Voice Commands: Enable microphone permissions to use voice input and receive spoken responses.

Backup & Export: Use the settings menu to schedule database backups and export tickets as CSV.

Billing: Go to Account > Billing to upgrade plans or view invoices. Payments handled via PayPal.

For further help, contact us at: harbi.a@laposte.net
